body:
Kirk Thibault wrote:

Hi Kirk,

thank you, but the task is to (optionally) switch off normal processing
in a script. It is about some dozens or maybe hundreds of obj's. I hope
to improve processing speed in radiance, but I do not really want to
delete the normals from the obj-Model, as they fit quite well.

Lars.
replyTo: Subject: [Radiance-general] filtering normal information from an obj
subject: [Radiance-general] filtering normal information from an obj
